data.subTitle: 原型继承
data.content:
function clone(object) {
  function F() {
  }

  F.prototype = object;
  return new F;
}

var Person = {
  name: '默认值',
  getName: function () {
    return this.name;
  }
}

var Author = clone(Person);
Author.books = []; // Default value.
Author.getBooks = function() {
  return this.books;
}
hugo = clone(Author);
hugo.name = 'hugo';
hugo.books =['Notre-Dame de Paris'];
hugo.getName();
hugo.getBooks();

这种继承比较节约内存。但是理解更加复杂。起属性默认值指向父类属性。
